name: FSHprojectIG
title: FSH project IG
description: Gives an example of how FSH can be used to create an IG

resource.name: FSH Birth Sex Extension
resource.description:
A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth as specified
   by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc).
   This extension aligns with the C-CDA Birth Sex Observation (LOINC 76689-9).

resource.name: FSH Medication Request
resource.description:
Defines constraints and extensions on the
   MedicationRequest resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve
   prescription information.

resource.name: FSH Patient
resource.description:
Defines constraints and extensions on the patient resource for 
  the minimal set of data to query and retrieve patient demographic information.

resource.name: FSH Practitioner
resource.description: A profile on the Practitioner resource
